title: Magnificent Diamond Emerald Moti Haaram - An Imperial Statement Piece
features: Intricately handcrafted Haaram featuring a cascading design with delicate diamond-studded floral motifs. The central pendant is adorned with a vibrant green emerald, exuding royalty. Thirteen lustrous South Sea Pearls dangle gracefully, adding a touch of ethereal beauty. Features elaborate filigree work, a hallmark of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with a striking pop of green from the emerald. The pearls offer a soft
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and other significant family events. A timeless heirloom for future generations.
description: A true masterpiece of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The exquisite combination of diamonds, emerald, and South Sea pearls creates a mesmerizing effect. This Haaram is a symbol of opulence, tradition, and timeless elegance, making it a prized possession for any discerning collector. It also has a rare emerald gemstone that enhances the beauty of the Haaram. This is a unique and statement piece that makes you the center of attraction in all events.
